items.name: Cascadian Rhythm Black IPA
items.desc: We’ve started out with a malt base of pale malt, rye, dark crystal and carafa 3 to give a slightly caramelised, spicy and dark base while being restrained on roast character. A hop bill of Amarillo, Cascade, Citra, Mosaic, Simcoe & Centenntial pairs with the malt to make the beer deliciously chewy, dank, piney and floral

items.name: Gardens Of Green Ne IPA
items.desc: Gardens of Green is a dual hop IPA series, tailoring recipe and process to best express each hop combination. We’ve paired Idaho & a soft touch of Sabro to create an IPA bursting with aromas of tropical fruit, mango and grapefruit with a faint hint of coconut boosting the tropical flavours!

items.name: Multiverse IPA Series
items.desc: Mutiverse is a series of beers in which we explore what it means for a single beer to exist in multiple states. Each beer has similarities and differences, each connected but existing in it’s own unique state. Moving to Level 2 we get a boost in abv and a base with extra pale, chit & flaked oats that provides a soft base for Galaxy hops take the spotlight. The supporting role comes with the classic pairing of Mosaic & Citra for a vibrant flavours of Passion Fruit & Citrus with a piney back bone

items.name: Pintle Pale Ale
items.desc: Pintle is our core pale pale ale, brewed with wheat, oats and flaked barley in the grist for a smooth body; Whirlpooled & dry hopped with both Australian Cascade and Citra, its restrained bitterness and dry finish help maintain Pintle's all day crushability
